resources.string: Hendroid is updating your collection.\nIt may require a few minutes.
Please select an existing Hentoid folder. Its location is displayed on screen.
New custom ordering will overwrite the previous one.
Share book URL and title using another app
Archive the book to a ZIP file
Title, artist, tag or book ID
Your device is low on memory!
Show detailed stats about current download errors
Cannot download - Low on storage (%s left). Free space or change download folder location
Cannot download - No download folder. Use app settings to select one
Cannot download - Download folder not found. Use app settings to select one
Cannot download - Insufficient credentials on download folder. Use app settings to reselect it
Cannot download - Stale Cookies or credentials. Use the notification to regenerate them
You can cancel downloads by swiping them to the left
An issue happened while redownloading - canceled
Tap here to reactivate your download
Please stay on this screen while your download is being revived
Could not save JSON of the queue
Cannot download %1$s: unable to create folder %2$s. Please check your Hentoid folder and retry downloading using the \'!\' button.
Automatically refresh library data by rescanning files and folders.
Rename all folders according to the current naming and max length preference
If no images folder is detected, imported books will appear as empty downloads.\nYou will have to download them using Queue > Errors.
Exporting metadata is meant to create a list of your books in JSON format.\nIt is not meant for moving your collection to your PC or your SD card.\nTap here to learn how to do that.
Books are exported without images.\nYou will have to download them again upon restore if the images folder is not present.
You must grant permissions before you can continue
You must manually grant permissions before you can continue
Invalid folder selected - please select another one
You cannot select the app folder as an external folder - please select another one
You shouldn\'t select your device\'s download folder - please create or select another one
Hendroid folder creation failed - please select another location
Task complete - see details in the log
Hendroid has recognized an existing library in this location.\nDo you want to import this library\?
You don\'t have permission to write in that folder, try another folder.
Error opening file: no relevant application found
Error opening link: no browser found
Error sending archive: no relevant application found
Total images in download: %1$d\nImages without errors: %2$d\nImages with errors: %3$d
Resume reading from where you left\?
How would you like to filter completed books\?
At least one book failed to be archived

resources.string: That\'s not in here, go download it.
This is a rather long title, just because we need it to be.
Artist: In this book there are so many artists crammed in one place that one display line definitely can\'t contain them all
"Changes will be applied after Hendroid is restarted"

resources.string: Set this book\'s cover as the current group cover\?
A group with that name already exists.
Nothing to delete - check "Allow deleting external content" to change that
Hold and drag to select\nEach selected chapter creates one new book
You already have this book. Search other sources\?
Be aware that downloads may fail on this site.
The download button is currently broken for this site.
This site currently has serious stability issues. The app has nothing to do about it. Please try again later.
This site is currently unavailable for real. The app has nothing to do about it. Please try again later.
The Hendroid dev team is working on a fix. You will be notified by the app when a new version is ready.
A fix is available on the latest version of the app. Please update.
App Lock prevents unauthorized use of this app by requiring a 4-digit PIN when launched
Hendroid is a Doujinshi & H-Manga archiving app. Hendroid is a fork of the app Hentoid, which was originally created by Cesar Arasaki.
PERSONAL DATA PRIVACY STATEMENT\n\nHendroid is a free and open-source software maintained by the Hendroid Community
No personal data is collected by the app, but may be collected by external sites.
This content cannot be downloaded. Sorry~
You\'ve reached a book page.\nTime to download with the bottom bar!

Book has a blocked tag (%s)\nQueued as an error
Toggle bookmark URL as welcome page

Please use or create an exHentai account

Incomplete credentials, please log in again. If the issue persists, consider accessing the site from another country or creating a new account.
